content.title: Edsby
content.description: My main work for the past 11 years. The majority of the site and its graphics are designed and created by me, including all the UI of the application itself. Built on a Wordpress template with additional custom coded functionality.

content.title: Joseph & Monique Wedding Website
content.description: A custom wedding website, includes custom RSVP collection form using the Google Sheets API to pull guest info from the Google Sheet, write it back to the doc, and send confirmation emails to the guests and the bride and groom.

content.title: Tweet2JPG
content.description: Small tool to pull tweet data using tweet ID. Primarily created for Edsby marketing team to facilitate easy tweet graphics for email newsletters

content.title: Notion Invoice Viewer
content.description: Using the Notion API to display a web interface of Invoices and select one to display and then print to PDF

content.title: Baby Pool
content.description: Baby pool tracker. Everyone enters their guesses which get input into a Google Sheet and then a winner is selected via a points system. Plus a cute little pure css penguin loader animation for extra whimsy.

content.title: SharkBot
content.description: Custom discord bot with autoresponder and a Leslie Knope compliment generator command

content.title: Paul & Jessica Wedding Website
content.description: A custom lightweight wedding website, all illustrations and lettering are custom-made, also includes parallax animations.

content.title: Age of Lapin
content.description: A completely from scratch designed brand identity and website for new age wellness. Includes a blog, a horoscope feed api, community events submissions, and a curated product section.

content.title: EY Entrepreneur of the Year
content.description: A single page microsite for EOY winners. Built on Wordpress.
